title: The Ancient Rite
description: You have declared support for Thane Grimjaw and the Rite of Succession. The Rite-Seekers rejoice, but the competition cannot begin without the sacred Hammer of the First King - an artifact that legitimizes any claim to the throne. Grimjaw believes it still rests in the Deep Vaults, protected by ancient wards that the goblins could not breach.

objectives.description: Find the sealed chamber in the Deep Vaults
Deactivate the ancient wards protecting the Hammer
Recover the Hammer of the First King
Return the Hammer to Thane Grimjaw

faction_outcome.result: The Rite of Succession begins. Borin and Grimjaw compete in trials of wisdom, strength, and leadership. The outcome will reshape Kazan-Dun for generations - and you have earned a place of honor regardless of who wins.
